trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGUNI5BASEOMICRON_00760_M051_000_000<tab>Greetings. Any requests you have of this unit should be made in a clear and concise manner.
TEXT_REGUNI5BASEOMICRON_00760_M051_000_010<tab>This unit has been designated M-051. This unit is responsible for the supervision and operation of the on-base energy plant.
TEXT_REGUNI5BASEOMICRON_00760_M051_000_011<tab>Please direct any complaints or suggestions regarding the plant to this unit. This unit will respond to them as efficiently as possible.
TEXT_REGUNI5BASEOMICRON_00760_M051_000_020<tab>This is Base Omicron, an outpost constructed to allow us to engage in combat with unfamiliar opponents.

TEXT_REGUNI5BASEOMICRON_00760_M051_000_021<tab>In accordance with Stigma-1's most recent orders, we are currently shoring up the base and our forces. Now we are awaiting further orders. Your cooperation is requested.

TEXT_REGUNI5BASEOMICRON_00760_M051_000_022<tab>An issue with our command structure has recently been detected. This unit calculates that it is due to differing interpretations of Stigma-1's orders. This unit has detected something you might refer to as “hope.”
